title: Localization key can't be blank when adding.
description: If the localization key is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB: When attempting to add a chart without entering a localization key, the externalized text is not displayed in the chart.
EB: The system should display the externalized text in the chart, even if the localization key is left blank.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the chart creation page. 2. Leave the localization key field blank and try to add the chart. The externalized text should not be displayed in the chart title.
